channel.title: Bestisoft
channel.description: Write an awesome description for your new site here. You can edit this line in _config.yml. It will appear in your document head meta (for Google search results) and in your feed.xml site description.

item.title: Bestisoft is hiring!
item.description:
Java Developer's

 

BESTISoft a company specializing in providing outsourced IT solutions for Western European markets, as well as independent project development, is looking to add 2 (two) team members for our office in Bitola.

 

If you find yourself comfortable working with the folowing:

  • Java tehnologies and frameworks (Java EE, Spring, JPA, Websevices)
  • Web techologies (Javascript, AngularJS, HTML5, REST)
  • Tools (nodejs, gulp, bower, git)
  • Flexible and able to adapt to new environments new technologies
  • Full stack development, from front-end to database
We offer:
  • Competitive salary
  • Opportunity to gain valuable experience under competent leadership
  • Excellent environment where you are respected and valued as a team member

 

Please send us your resume and cover letter to jobs@bestisoft.com

 

Job application process is open until 30.09.2015
